var(--primary);\n    color: #011;\n    font-weight: 600;\n  }\n\n  /* Hide scrollbar for textarea */\n  .f8-textarea::-webkit-scrollbar {\n    display: none;\n  }\n\n  .f8-textarea {\n    -ms-overflow-style: none;\n    scrollbar-width: none;\n  }\n&lt;/style&gt;\n\n&lt;script&gt;\n  // TVM Carousel Functionality\n  document.addEventListener(&#39;DOMContentLoaded&#39;, function() {\n    const slides = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-slide&#39;);\n    const dots = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-dot&#39;);\n    let currentSlide = 0;\n    \n    function showSlide(index: number) {\n      // Hide all slides\n      slides.forEach(slide =&gt; slide.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      dots.forEach(dot =&gt; dot.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      \n      // Show current slide\n      slides[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      dots[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      \n      currentSlide = index;\n    }\n    \n    function nextSlide() {\n      const next = (currentSlide + 1) % slides.length;\n      showSlide(next);\n    }\n    \n    // Add click event listeners to dots\n    dots.forEach((dot, index: number) =&gt; {\n      dot.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; showSlide(index));\n    });\n    \n    // Auto-advance carousel every 4 seconds\n    setInterval(nextSlide, 4000);\n  });\n&lt;/script&gt;\n&quot;
}
```

const slides = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-slide&#39;);\n    const dots = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-dot&#39;);\n    let currentSlide = 0;\n    \n    function showSlide(index: number) {\n      // Hide all slides\n      slides.forEach(slide =&gt; slide.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      dots.forEach(dot =&gt; dot.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      \n      // Show current slide\n      slides[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      dots[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      \n      currentSlide = index;\n    }\n    \n    function nextSlide() {\n      const next = (currentSlide + 1) % slides.length;\n      showSlide(next);\n    }\n    \n    // Add click event listeners to dots\n    dots.forEach((dot, index: number) =&gt; {\n      dot.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; showSlide(index));\n    });\n    \n    // Auto-advance carousel every 4 seconds\n    setInterval(nextSlide, 4000);\n  });\n&lt;/script&gt;\n&quot;

const slides = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-slide&#39;);\n    const dots = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-dot&#39;);\n    let currentSlide = 0;\n    \n    function showSlide(index: number) {\n      // Hide all slides\n      slides.forEach(slide =&gt; slide.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      dots.forEach(dot =&gt; dot.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      \n      // Show current slide\n      slides[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      dots[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      \n      currentSlide = index;\n    }\n    \n    function nextSlide() {\n      const next = (currentSlide + 1) % slides.length;\n      showSlide(next);\n    }\n    \n    // Add click event listeners to dots\n    dots.forEach((dot, index: number) =&gt; {\n      dot.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; showSlide(index));\n    });\n    \n    // Auto-advance carousel every 4 seconds\n    setInterval(nextSlide, 4000);\n  });\n&lt;/script&gt;\n&quot;

Hide all slides\n      slides.forEach(slide =&gt; slide.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      dots.forEach(dot =&gt; dot.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      \n      // Show current slide\n      slides[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      dots[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      \n      currentSlide = index;\n    }\n    \n    function nextSlide() {\n      const next = (currentSlide + 1) % slides.length;\n      showSlide(next);\n    }\n    \n    // Add click event listeners to dots\n    dots.forEach((dot, index: number) =&gt; {\n      dot.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; showSlide(index));\n    });\n    \n    // Auto-advance carousel every 4 seconds\n    setInterval(nextSlide, 4000);\n  });\n&lt;/script&gt;\n&quot;

-ms-overflow-style: none;\n    scrollbar-width: none;\n  }\n&lt;/style&gt;\n\n&lt;script&gt;\n  // TVM Carousel Functionality\n  document.addEventListener(&#39;DOMContentLoaded&#39;, function() {\n    const slides = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-slide&#39;);\n    const dots = document.querySelectorAll(&#39;.tvm-dot&#39;);\n    let currentSlide = 0;\n    \n    function showSlide(index: number) {\n      // Hide all slides\n      slides.forEach(slide =&gt; slide.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      dots.forEach(dot =&gt; dot.classList.remove(&#39;active&#39;));\n      \n      // Show current slide\n      slides[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      dots[index].classList.add(&#39;active&#39;);\n      \n      currentSlide = index;\n    }\n    \n    function nextSlide() {\n      const next = (currentSlide + 1) % slides.length;\n      showSlide(next);\n    }\n    \n    // Add click event listeners to dots\n    dots.forEach((dot, index: number) =&gt; {\n      dot.addEventListener(&#39;click&#39;, () =&gt; showSlide(index));\n    });\n    \n    // Auto-advance carousel every 4 seconds\n    setInterval(nextSlide, 4000);\n  });\n&lt;/script&gt;\n&quot;
}
